casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Damon Lee FLAGLER, a.k.a. Beeno, Defendant-Appellant. No. 08-16364

Non-Argument Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Eleventh Circuit. June 10, 2009. Damon Lee Flagler, Salters, SC, pro se. Patricia D. Barksdale, Jacksonville, FL, for Plaintiff-Appellee. Before BLACK, BARKETT and KRAVITCH, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM:

Lisa Call, appointed counsel for Damon Lee Flagler in this direct criminal appeal, has moved to withdraw from further representation of the appellant and filed a brief prepared pursuant to Anders v. California, 386 U.S. 738, 87 S.Ct. 1396, 18 L.Ed.2d 493 (1967). Because independent examination of the entire record reveals no arguable issues of merit, counsel’s motion to withdraw is GRANTED, and Flagler’s conviction and sentence are AFFIRMED.
